remarks: If the result of subtracting two numbers is greater than a number, the result of adding one of these subtracted numbers to the number is less than the result of subtracting the other subtracted number only. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 9-Jun-2018.)
statement: ltsubsubaddltsub $p |- ( ( J e. RR /\ ( L e. RR /\ M e. RR /\ N e. RR ) ) -> ( J < ( ( L - M ) - N ) <-> ( J + M ) < ( L - N ) ) ) $.
